creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: primitive style; frowning couple with grey hair with woman at left wearing blue and purple checked blouse and red and yellow checked skirt and man at right wearing a tan and purple striped suit, white shirt and red necktie, standing on stilts; foliage behind couple; multicolored predominately yellow, orange and green shapes; green and black borders
inscription: on back in black ink: 846 | on back in pencil: EA 48
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
signed: on back in pencil: Eddie Arning
title: Woman with Man on Stilts
